data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Fangying, Dai, Wu, Zhang, Yalin (2015): Review of species of the Scaphoideus albovittatus group (Hemiptera, Cicadellidae, Deltocephalinae) from China, with a checklist and distribution summary for Chinese species in the genus. Zootaxa 3904 (3): 334-358, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3904.3.2
